631190.name: SHOW MUST GO ON Demo
631190.description:
SHOW MUST GO ON is easy to play the rhythm VR game which will give you a lot of fun!

Jump onto the stage and make your music show.
Wake up the dancers and let them feel the rhythm with you.
Fill the stage with colors and lights effects.
All you need to do is to feel the beat.
Hit the drums in time with the music.
Collect the following bubbles connected with stars.
Puncture the bubbles.

Do it perfectly then the next dancers will start to dance and the points multiplier will increase.
If you like energetic music, rhythms and drums SHOW MUST GO ON is for you!

HOW TO PLAY ?

In SHOW MUST GO ON there are three types of instruments:

DRUMS
You need to hit the drum exactly at the moment when the marker passes through the hoop.

BUBBLES
Puncture the bubbles exactly at the moment when the whole bubble fills with the color.

SOUND TRACKERS
Grab the bubbles exactly at the moment when the whole bubble fills with the color.
Collect blue bubbles using the blue wand.
Collect yellow bubbles using the yellow wand.
Collect also the stars. They will give you additional points.

XYLOPHONE
Hit the key with a stick when the bubble reaches the key and his inside fills with color.
Blue and green color is for upper keys, red and orange is for the bottom.

LIST OF 26 TRACKS
A Beautiful Life [easy]
All Night Rock [very hard]
Evolution [hard]
Himalaya [hard]
Just Feel The Beat [easy]
Legacy [normal]
Lets Rock And Dance [very hard]
Life Is Beautiful [normal]

Accordion [normal]
Brass Ska [hard]
Polka [hard]
Reggae Ska [easy]

Brazil Samba [hard]
Electro Swing [normal]
Positive Dubstep [very hard]

Alternative Rock [very easy]
Beat [very easy]
Hard Rock Upbeat [very easy]
Hip Hop Dubstep [easy]
Rocking Country Blues [very easy]
This Is Positive [easy]

Swedish Clubbing [hard]
Swing It [hard]
Orchestra Dubstep [normal]
Funky Dance Pop [hard]
Happy Summer [normal]

You can choose what you like
SKA,
LATINO,
ROCK,
POP,
ELECTRO,
SWING,
SAMBA
DUBSTEP


POINTS
You will get:
10 points - PERFECT
5 points - GREAT
3 points - OK

MULTIPLIERS
Over the heads of the dancers, there are numbers. These are multipliers points.
When you wake up following dancers, the multiplier will start to increase your score according to the number.

ADDITIONAL POINTS
In sound, trackers collect also the stars connecting the bubbles. They will give you some extra points.
At the time when you collect 4 or more perfects in a row (for right and left hand separate), you will also receive extra 250 points.
